sect2.title: Transform Submenu
sect2.para: The items on the Transform submenu transform the image by flipping it or rotating it.

sect3.title: Activating the Submenu
sect3.para:
You can access this submenu from the main menu through
Image Transform .

sect3.title: The Contents of the Transform Submenu
sect3.para: The Transform submenu has the following commands:

para.link: Rotate 90° clockwise / counter-clockwise; Rotate 180°; Arbitrary Rotation
